metadata.title: CVE-2018-20170 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** OpenStack Keystone through 14.0.1 has a user enumerationvulnerability because invalid usernames have much faster responses thanvalid ones for a POST /v3/auth/tokens request. NOTE: the vendor's positionis that this is a hardening opportunity, and not necessarily an issue thatshould have an OpenStack Security Advisory.

criterions.comment: keystone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
